item.title: PicoCalc mod
item.description: ClockworkPi’s PicoCalc is great but you know me. It could be even better with just a few hardware upgrades and entirely new software… Enjoy!

item.title: Cition portable mk2
item.description: Have you ever wanted to have a portable workstation straight from movies? Me too, that’s why I have made this - a portable workstation enclosed in durable Pelican Case

item.title: Cition portable
item.description: Totally not a 15kg Pelican Case fitted with overengineered guts to allow for usage totally everywhere!

item.title: Obsium mk2
item.description: Obsium mk2 is an upgraded version of my beloved Obsium.

item.title: Obsium mk1
item.description: Cyberdecks serve a different purpose for everybody. Some create it purely for fun others try to make a perfect „laptop” like device to fulfil all of their needs. For me it is both.
